attributes.action: Bobby Moore to get a posthumous knighthood
attributes.additional_details:
World Cup winner
Facupfinal winner
European cup winners cup winner
attributes.background: Winning captain of the only World Cup England has won,died without being knighted.

rejection.details:
We can't accept your petition because it asks for someone to be nominated for an honour. 

Members of the public can nominate people for honours directly. You can find out how to nominate someone for an honour here:

https://www.gov.uk/honours
